ai-atk-s0517a5:95_0: He should look forward to enjoying goodness, skilled in embracing which is unskillful, emptiness, skilled in what is skillful and what is unskillful.
ai-atk-s0517a5:95_1: But although these two beginning with the fading away of greed, etc., are distinguished as letting go of all insight and knowledge and vision, they are not skilled in making dispassionate towards them, saying “How is in these eight ways,” etc., they are an instances of insight and understanding, an individual essencesences, etc., because they are distinguished by insight beginning with the knowledge and vision of the variety of conditions.

ai-atk-s0517a5:95_4: Thus the eight drawbacks and the first drawbacks of insight can be understood and directed to the six drawbacks of insights, these nine respects, etc., and then the one who is expelled in Mahānāma, should be understood these nine respects.

ai-atk-s0517a5:99_3: faith faculty, wisdom is shown by one who is preying for the five faculties, etc., which is not dispelled, and so on.
ai-atk-s0517a5:99_4: And although the sounds of the five faculties, with the five roots and six faculties, five powers, and one whose faculties are made of the five faculties, with the five faculties and five powers, etc., should they show the one whose faculties at the time of each other, and so on.
ai-atk-s0517a5:99_5: and because of the dwindling away of the sounds and roots, five faculties, five powers, and six faculties, five powers, and seven fruits, etc., are showing each of the body and five faculties.
ai-atk-s0517a5:99_6: Again when the Buddha wants to see the faculties through a Buddha, through the wide-confidence of the faculties he had seen (only),
ai-atk-s0517a5:99_7: Herein, the Buddha’s faculties: knowledge of the sense faculties, and his oppression of the knowledge of the sense faculties,
ai-atk-s0517a5:99_8: The Buddha is the only knowledge; it is for them that is, it is stated.
ai-atk-s0517a5:100_0: The commentary on the faculties is finished.
